meta.dc:title: S1646 ENR: To designate the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in St. Augustine, Florida, as the “Leo C. Chase Jr. Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic”.

meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
To designate the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in St. Augustine, Florida, as the “Leo C. Chase Jr. Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic”.

main.name: S1646

content.p: To designate the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in St. Augustine, Florida, as the “Leo C. Chase Jr. Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic”.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Designation of Leo C. Chase Jr. Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

subsection.heading: Designation.—
subsection.content: The community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs located at 207 Stratton Road, St. Augustine, Florida, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the “Leo C. Chase Jr. Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic” or the “Leo C. Chase Jr. VA Clinic”.

subsection.heading: Reference.—
subsection.content: Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Leo C. Chase Jr. Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
